text: 11:9 Jenesis 12:8; 13:3; 13:18; 18:1; 18:9; 26:3; 35:12; 35:27; Hibru 6:17A nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikia ghua nguazir kamɨn apera, nguazir God fomɨra a danɨngasa akam akɨrizim. Egha a nguazir kam gaperagha mati nguibar igharazimɨn gumazim. A Purirpenim gaperaghav iti, moghɨn Aisak ko Jekop uaghan uan purirpenibagh apiaghav iti, gumazir kamning God nguazir kam gɨnɨghnɨgha egha uaghan akar kam aning bagha anekɨri.
